small.description: Basic tower, takes up 1x1 grid space

medium.description: Advanced tower, takes up 2x2 grid space

large.description: Elite tower, takes up 3x3 grid space

normal.description: Standard physical damage with no special armor-piercing properties.

piercing.description: Damage that partially ignores armor, especially effective against lightly armored foes.

chaos.description: Unpredictable, raw energy damage that deals full damage regardless of armor.

siege.description: Specialized damage effective against fortified or heavily armored targets.

arcane.description: Mystical damage that bypasses some defenses and may trigger magical effects.

crystal_castle.description: Pure Chaos damage snipers and chain beams—armor bypass, very high single target DPS when built out.

crystal_wall.name: Crystal Wall
crystal_wall.description: A crystalline wall, impenetrable to all.

special.description: Blocks enemies from traversing the map.

crystal_shooter.name: Crystal Shooter
crystal_shooter.description: A very powerful starting tower, ejecting a large crystal to center mass of its target.

diamond_cutter.name: Diamond Cutter
diamond_cutter.description: A diamond cutter that shoots mind-bogglingly sharp diamond edge crystals at a target

crystal_cannon.name: Crystal Cannon
crystal_cannon.description: A cannon that shoots fused gemstones at a target

crystal_fury.name: Crystal Fury
crystal_fury.description: The crystals coalesce to decimate enemies.

crystal_castle_facet_focuser.name: Facet Focuser
crystal_castle_facet_focuser.description: A powerful crystal that focuses energy onto a single target.

crystal_blaster.name: Gemstone Blaster
crystal_blaster.description: A powerful cannon that blasts crystal shards at a single target. May crit.

crystal_dissolver.name: Crystal Dissolver
crystal_dissolver.description: A powerful crystal that bores a precise hole through any enemy unit.

pyro.description: Heavy splash + burn over time auras and traps. Excels at crowd control.

pyro_wall.name: Fire Wall
pyro_wall.description: A flaming wall that cuts off enemy movement.

special.description: Blocks enemies from traversing the map.

pyro_flare_tower.name: Flare Tower
pyro_flare_tower.description: A tower that shoots a fiery projectile that deals damage to enemies.

special.description: Burns enemies.

pyro_fire_trap.name: Fire Trap
pyro_fire_trap.description: A fire trap that burns enemies that walk over it.

special.description: Burns ground enemies that walk over it.

pyro_flame_dancer.name: Flame Dancer
pyro_flame_dancer.description: A skilled flame dancer that slashes with a fiery blade.

special.description: Burns enemies.

pyro_pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
pyro_pyromaniac.description: A deranged pyromaniac that torches enemies with a flamethrower. Large splash radius. Can target air units.

special.description: Burns enemies.

pyro_searing_tower.name: Searing Tower
pyro_searing_tower.description: A searing tower that blasts enemies with fireballs. Large splash radius. Can target air units.

special.description: Burns ground enemies that walk over it.

pyro_incinerator.name: Incinerator
pyro_incinerator.description: A blazing incinerator vent from the burning molten core of the Pyro Empire. Radiates intense heat in a small area that also damages enemies unfortunate enough to be in the area.

tank_legion.description: Slow, heavy siege; excels at killing Fortified units

tank_wall.name: Tank Wall
tank_wall.description: Walls guard all tanks from surprise attacks.

special.description: Blocks enemies from traversing the map.

tank_defender.name: Tank Defender
tank_defender.description: A tank defender equipped with a rocket launcher that defends the tank command.

special.description: Deals more damage the further the target is upon impact.
Deals more damage the further the target is upon impact.

tank_blasto_mortar.name: Blasto Mortar Tank
tank_blasto_mortar.description: Powerful artillery that can deals huge AOE damage.

special.description: Impact deals full damage in a small area.

tank_hercules_javelin_tank.name: Hercules Javelin Tank
tank_hercules_javelin_tank.description: A large tank with a powerful javelin launcher that can deal massive damage to enemies.

special.description: Deals more damage the further the target is upon impact.

tank_cauldron_juggernaut.name: Cauldron Juggernaut
tank_cauldron_juggernaut.description: A supremely powerful tank that fires a massive concussive shell.

special.description: Deals more damage the further the target is upon impact.

zork.description: A rapidly multiplying swarm, large AOE, overwhelming foes with sheer numbers of cheap, expendable units.

zork_wall.name: Zork Wall
zork_wall.description: A purely gross wall of pure biomass.

special.description: Blocks enemies from traversing the map.

zork_zorkling_spawner.name: Zorkling Spawner
zork_zorkling_spawner.description: A Zorkling Spawner that spawns a horde of Zorklings at the enemy.

zork_slime_spewer.name: Slime Spewer
zork_slime_spewer.description: Spews a disgusting green slime across a large area.

zork_creep_colony.name: Creep Colony
zork_creep_colony.description: An eerie pitted terrain, breeding grounds for the Zork Swarm.

zork_horde_hurler.name: Horde Hurler
zork_horde_hurler.description: Launches a Zork Egg that spawns a horde of Zorklings at the enemy that gnaws at them with sharp teeth.

zork_swarmers.name: Swarmers
zork_swarmers.description: A compacted swarm of zorklisks that deal damage to both ground and air units.

special.description: Swarmers connected within 400 units of each other have their attack speed boosted by 10%

zork_brood_lord.name: Zork Brood Lord
zork_brood_lord.description: A hideous, towering monstrosity that leads the Zork Swarm to overwhelming odds.

special.description: Increases the attack speed of all Zorklings in the area by 20%.

gaia.description: Guardians of the forest, Gaia towers blend natural defenses with primal strength, featuring powerful siege and splash capabilities.

gaia_toadstool.name: Toadstool
gaia_toadstool.description: A sturdy, impassable toadstool that blocks enemy pathing.

gaia_forest_warden.name: Forest Warden
gaia_forest_warden.description: A guardian of the forest, the Forest Warden is a powerful hunter that deals damage to both ground and air units.

gaia_treant_boulder_thrower.name: Treant Boulder Thrower
gaia_treant_boulder_thrower.description: A treant that throws boulders at the enemy, dealing damage to both ground and air units in a large area.

gaia_gaias_box.name: Gaia's Box
gaia_gaias_box.description: Gaia's Box is a powerful earthen beam that deals damage to both ground and air units.

gaia_gnome.name: Gnome
gaia_gnome.description: Gaia's Gnomes are small but mighty. With luck on their side, they deal random damage, with a high (250%) critical multiplier.

gaia_ursa.name: Ursa
gaia_ursa.description: The ferocious ursine warriors defend the forest and their kin at all costs. May crit.

gaia_gift_of_gaia.name: Gift of Gaia
gaia_gift_of_gaia.description: A gift from the goddess herself, this ensures the destruction of all who breach the sanctity of the grove.

knights_keep.description: The Humans of the Knights Keep are a disciplined order relying on man and machine alike to defend their lands.

knights_wall.name: Castle Wall
knights_wall.description: The castle wall is a sturdy defense designed to keep invaders out.

special.description: Blocks enemies from traversing the map.

knights_militia.name: Footman
knights_militia.description: The footman takes up arms to defend the kingdom.

knights_watchtower.name: Watchtower
knights_watchtower.description: The guards in the watchtower tirelessly guard the kingdom.

knights_arcane_tower.name: Arcanum Tower
knights_arcane_tower.description: Wizards research arcane magic to use against the forces of evil

knights_arrow_tower.name: Arrow Tower
knights_arrow_tower.description: Armed with archers at the ready, the arrow tower prepares to defend the kingdom.

knights_ballista.name: Ballista
knights_ballista.description: A ballista shoots a large heavy bolt that penetrates countless enemies.

knights_knight.name: Knight
knights_knight.description: The knight is a powerful melee unit that can execute his foes.

special.description: Periodically attempts to instantly kill a nearby low-health enemy (below 15% HP).

bomb_brigade.description: Huge AOE, splash damage and big range, however they only deal siege damage.

special.description: Blocks enemies from traversing the map.

bomb_lobber.name: Bomb Lobber
bomb_lobber.description: This tower throws bombs at the enemy in rapid succession.

bomb_mine_field.name: Mine Field
bomb_mine_field.description: A mine field that deals damage to ground units walking over it.

bomb_grenade_launcher.name: Grenade Launcher
bomb_grenade_launcher.description: A bouncing grenade dealing damage to both ground and air units in a large area.

bomb_bombardier.name: Bombardier
bomb_bombardier.description: A rocket launcher dealing high damage to both air and ground units.

bomb_barrage_beacon.name: Bombardment Beacon
bomb_barrage_beacon.description: Periodically calls down random artillery strikes within a large radius.

special.description: Periodically calls down random artillery strikes within a large radius.

stone_summoners.description: Their towers critically strike for double damage, doubling their splash radius.

special.description: Critical hits have double the splash radius.

stone_stonebreaker.name: Stonebreaker
stone_stonebreaker.description: Shoots a large, enchanted rock, used by the stone shamans to break through all earthen materials.

special.description: Critical hits have double the splash radius.

stone_golem.name: Golem
stone_golem.description: A large, stone golem that can be used to break through all earthen materials.

special.description: Critical hits have double the splash radius.

stone_tremor_totem.name: Tremor Totem
stone_tremor_totem.description: A totem that causes tremors to shake the ground, damaging units randomly in a small area.

special.description: Critical hits have double the splash radius.

stone_earth_spine.name: Earth Spine
stone_earth_spine.description: A towering spine of rock that destroys fortified units.

alchemists_guild.description: Experimenters wielding volatile concoctions and corrupted magic that melt armor, poison foes, and transmute reality.

alchemists_wall.name: Mercurial Wall
alchemists_wall.description: These walls seal off the alchemists' labs and bunkers

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

alchemists_poison_dart_launcher.name: Poison Dart Launcher
alchemists_poison_dart_launcher.description: Albmeists need to keep intruders away, what better way than to throw darts with poison?

alchemists_miasma_pillar.name: Miasma Pillar
alchemists_miasma_pillar.description: A tower radiating with pulsating poison gas, resultant of the alchemists' experiments.

alchemists_toxin_lab.name: Toxin Lab
alchemists_toxin_lab.description: Toxic substances must be handled with care.

alchemists_caustic_cannon.name: Caustic Cannon
alchemists_caustic_cannon.description: The alchemists' experimentation often leaves them with a surplus of detritus.

alchemists_chemical_plant.name: Chemical Plant
alchemists_chemical_plant.description: A tower that spits a particularly vile chemical developed as a byproduct of transmutation.

alchemists_plague_reactor.name: Plague Reactor
alchemists_plague_reactor.description: A tower of wretched experimentation, mutating and amplifying all damage-over-time effects in a large radius.

special.description: Amplifies the damage of all DoT effects by 250% in a large radius.

igloo.description: Harnessing the biting cold, these structures slow and shatter foes with ice and frost.

igloo_wall.name: Ice Block
igloo_wall.description: A block of ice, blocking the way of all invaders.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

igloo_snowball_tosser.name: Snowball Tosser
igloo_snowball_tosser.description: Throwing 'harmless' snowballs at enemies signals that intruders should probably stay back.

special.description: Deals 25% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.

igloo_glacial_heart.name: Glacial Heart
igloo_glacial_heart.description: A frozen heart, sending an unrelenting chill through all enemies attempting to traverse the tundra.

igloo_frost_pulse.name: Frost Pulse
igloo_frost_pulse.description: A tower that sends out frozen pulses, causing enemies to slow down considerably.

igloo_icicle_launcher.name: Icicle Launcher
igloo_icicle_launcher.description: Hurls incredibly sharp, incredibly dangerous icicles at enemies.

special.description: Deals 50% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.

igloo_yeti.name: Yeti
igloo_yeti.description: The yeti is a savage beast, capable of crushing enemies with its massive fists.

special.description: Deals 30% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.

igloo_glacier_cannon.name: Glacier Cannon
igloo_glacier_cannon.description: Fires a gigantic glacier at enemies.

special.description: Deals 90% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.

alien.description: Wielders of cosmic energies, manipulating starlight, nebulas, and the void itself.

alien_wall.name: Alien Wall
alien_wall.description: A strange wall made of alien technology, blocking the way of all invaders.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

alien_drone.name: Alien Drone
alien_drone.description: A drone construct, critical to the maintenance of alien technology. And for salvaging conquered worlds.

alien_prober.name: Prober
alien_prober.description: Launches a probe that attempts to penetrate the enemy's skull. For research, of course.

alien_ufo.name: UFO
alien_ufo.description: A flying saucer that shoots destructive discs at enemies.

alien_tachyon_lance.name: Tachyon Lance
alien_tachyon_lance.description: A tower that shoots a beam of superluminal energy, cutting through all enemies alike.

alien_orbiter.name: Orbiter
alien_orbiter.description: A tower that creates a ring of energy orbs that orbit around it, damaging enemies.

special.description: Deploys orbiting energy orbs that damage nearby enemies.

alien_black_hole_generator.name: Black Hole Generator
alien_black_hole_generator.description: A generator that creates a contained singularity, obliterating everything in its vicinity.

goblin_hovel.description: A ramshackle collection of crude contraptions and sneaky goblins. Wild min max.

goblin_wall.name: Skrapheep
goblin_wall.description: One mans trash is goblins treasure. A wall made of scrap metal and junk.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

goblin_snotlings.name: Snotlinz
goblin_snotlings.description: Goblin slaves with crude clubs and axes. A bit of a mess, but they're cheap... and relentless.

goblin_junker.name: Goblin Junkka
goblin_junker.description: An interesting contraption shoots a shower of junk that somehow manages to hit everything and nothing all at once.t

goblin_ripper_mekk.name: Goblin Skrappaaa
goblin_ripper_mekk.description: These goblins are masters of junkyard engineering, and their creations are... 'uniquely' effective.

special.description: Has a 15% chance on hit to permanently shred 1 armor from the target.

goblin_skrap_tank.name: Skrap Tank
goblin_skrap_tank.description: A crudely built goblin tank made of scavenged parts, held together with duct tape and hope.

special.description: Has a 5% chance to malfunction and self-destruct, dealing 1000 damage to all enemies in a 800 radius.

goblin_catapult_brigade.name: Goblin Katapult Skwad
goblin_catapult_brigade.description: Who needs precision when you can just launch everything? These goblins are more about chaos than accuracy, but they sure know how to make a big impact.

special.description: Has a 25% chance to misfire.

goblin_shredder.name: Goblin Shreddaaa
goblin_shredder.description: Goblin savagery at its finest. A brutal cage contraption that rips enemies apart. Causes heavy hemmorhage damage over time.

brine.description: Crushing depths, arcane magic -- all towers have high splash and a chance to bash enemies.

brine_wall.name: Altar of the Deep
brine_wall.description: A sacred altar blocking the deep waters from invaders.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

brine_coral_trident.name: Coral Trident
brine_coral_trident.description: Even the coral have spears. Don't try to reach the sunken cities.

special.description: Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.

brine_serpent_coiler.name: Serpent Coiler
brine_serpent_coiler.description: A serpent coiler that coils around its foes, causing them to lose control.

special.description: Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.

brine_cascade_monument.name: Cascade Monument
brine_cascade_monument.description: A monument constructred to keep enemies at bay by keeping the tides high.

special.description: Increases the splash radius of nearby towers by 75.

brine_naga_depth_guard.name: Naga Depth Guard
brine_naga_depth_guard.description: Going through a Depth Guard is a challenge in and of itself.

special.description: Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.

brine_tidal_guardian.name: Tidal Guardian
brine_tidal_guardian.description: A guardian of the deep sea, entrusted with protection of their sacred temples.

special.description: Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.

brine_vortex_monument.name: Vortex Monument
brine_vortex_monument.description: A monument to a serpentine goddess that creates a vortex of arcane energy.

special.description: Continuously damages nearby enemies. Damage increases closer to the monument.

spark.description: Harnessing raw electrical energy to shock, stun, and overload enemies.

spark_wall.name: Spark Wall
spark_wall.description: A barrier to keep the electricity in, presumably.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

spark_static_post.name: Static Post
spark_static_post.description: A tower that shocks enemies with electricity.

spark_shock_node.name: Electric Fence
spark_shock_node.description: A fence that discharges electricity to any foe foolish enough to come in contact.

spark_arc_tower.name: Arc Tower
spark_arc_tower.description: Individually fires a weak projectile. Links with nearby Arc Towers to unleash a powerful chain zap from the furthest linked tower, dealing damage based on chain length.

spark_zap_coil.name: Zap Coil
spark_zap_coil.description: A large coil that paralyzes its foes with electricity.

spark_lightning_rod.name: Lightning Rod
spark_lightning_rod.description: A lightning rod that attracts lightning from the sky.

special.description: Creates a chain lightning effect jumps to 4 nearby targets, with damage dropping off by 30% per jump.

spark_power_plant.name: Power Plant
spark_power_plant.description: A power plant that generates overloads their towers with excessive energy.

special.description: Boosts the attack speed of immediately adjacent towers.

spark_storm_generator.name: Storm Generator
spark_storm_generator.description: Unleashes a turbulent, violent storm across the battlefield.

void_husks.description: Undead remnants animated by void energy, draining the lifeforce of their foes.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

husk_void_leecher.name: Void Leecher
husk_void_leecher.description: A tower that drains the life force of its foes.

husk_soulless.name: Soulless
husk_soulless.description: A drone whose soul has been ripped away by the void.

husk_void_stalker.name: Void Stalker
husk_void_stalker.description: The void stalkers inject the void into their foes.

husk_entropy_trooper.name: Entropy Trooper
husk_entropy_trooper.description: The entropy trooper injects the void into every unfortunate soul they come across.

special.description: Each hit permanently reduces the target's maximum HP by 1%.

husk_rift_walker.name: Rift Walker
husk_rift_walker.description: The rift walker manipulates the void to steal the souls across the multiverse.

special.description: Each hit permanently reduces the target's maximum HP by 2%.

husk_void_horror.name: Void Horror
husk_void_horror.description: The void horror is unleashed to decimate entire armies who oppose the call of the void.

special.description: Gains +75 damage per consecutive hit (max 15 stacks). Stacks reset after 0.5 seconds without attacking.

tac.description: Titan Assembly Command fields specialized Titans for combating all threats.

tac_wall.name: Machine Core
tac_wall.description: A dormant core waiting to be assembled into a Titan.

special.description: Every 5th strike deals an additional 50 damage.

tac_jaguar_mech.name: Jaguar Mech
tac_jaguar_mech.description: A swift and deadly predator, striking with unmatched speed and precision.

special.description: Has a 20% chance to strike twice in quick succession.

tac_samurai_mech.name: Samurai Mech
tac_samurai_mech.description: A perfect blend of ancient discipline and modern power.

special.description: Has a 25% chance on hit to ignore 15 armor for this attack.

tac_athena_mech.name: Athena Mech
tac_athena_mech.description: Athena Mech targets the greatest threats, delivering a calculated blow to ensure victory

special.description: Prioritizes enemies with the highest current health.

tac_pummeler_mech.name: Pummeler Mech
tac_pummeler_mech.description: Devastating blows shake the ground, dealing immense splash to nearby enemies.

special.description: Each kill increases this towers permanent damage by 0.25 to a max of 450.

police_station.description: The Police. Their high powered semi automatic weapons pierce adjacent enemies.

police_wall.name: Police Blockade
police_wall.description: This blockade allows the police to funnel enemies into a more advantageous space.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

police_swat.name: SWAT Officer
police_swat.description: Highly trained and equipped to take on any threat.

police_breacher.name: Breacher
police_breacher.description: Heavy infantry, equipped with a shield and a shotgun. Very tactical.

police_sniper_tower.name: Sniper Tower
police_sniper_tower.description: A sniper tower that can take on any threat from a distance.

special.description: Snipers have a 10% chance to headshot enemies for 1000% damage.

police_hq.name: Police HQ
police_hq.description: The Police may rally around their HQ to hold the line from illicit activity.

special.description: Boosts the damage of immediately adjacent towers by 15%.

tech_center.description: Advanced scientists pushing the boundaries of range and firepower, culminating in the ultimate weapon.

tech_wall.name: Energy Wall
tech_wall.description: A wall comprised of pure science.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

tech_laser.name: Laser
tech_laser.description: A high tech laser beam that deals damage to its intended target.

tech_upgraded_laser.name: Upgraded Laser
tech_upgraded_laser.description: A more powerful laser that expands the capabilities of the laser.

tech_particle_accelerator.name: Particle Accelerator
tech_particle_accelerator.description: A particle accelerator that fires a high-speed particle beam, dealing damage to its intended target.

tech_ground_targeting_computer.name: Targeting Computer
tech_ground_targeting_computer.description: A targeting computer that allows towers to lock on to enemies.

special.description: Periodically marks the highest health enemy in range, causing it to take 50% more damage from all sources.

tech_freeze_ray.name: Freeze Ray
tech_freeze_ray.description: Manipulating the molecular structure of the air, this tower can slow enemies to a crawl.

tech_railgun.name: Railgun
tech_railgun.description: A supremely advanced superpowered railgun that deals high chaos damage.

tech_time_machine.name: Time Machine
tech_time_machine.description: A marvel of engineering, capable of rewinding time to a previous point.

seadogs.description: Featuring cannons and harpoons, may plunder extra gold from slain enemies.

seadog_wall.name: Ship Banner
seadog_wall.description: Enemies know where not to tread.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

seadog_saltwater_scoundrel.name: Saltwater Scoundrel
seadog_saltwater_scoundrel.description: Small time cutthroats intent on stealing your valuables.

special.description: Has a 15% chance to grant 1 gold on a killing blow.

seadog_chain_shot_cannon.name: Chain Shot Cannon
seadog_chain_shot_cannon.description: A cannon that fires small chain shot projectiles, slowing enemy movement.

seadog_slaver.name: Slaver
seadog_slaver.description: Ruthless slavers that use whips to attack enemies.

special.description: Whips up to 2 enemies in range, dealing 50% damage to the first targets and 100% damage to the last target hit.

seadog_broadside.name: Broadside
seadog_broadside.description: A large ship that fires 3 cannons from each side.

special.description: Fires 3 cannons from each side.

seadog_cannoneer.name: Cannoneer
seadog_cannoneer.description: Fires a massive cannonball, but takes a long time to reload.

seadog_harpoon_tower.name: Harpoon Tower
seadog_harpoon_tower.description: A tower that uses harpoons to pull enemies towards it.

special.description: Multiple harpoon towers may shear enemies

heaven.description: Angelic defenders whose attacks always ignore a percentage of enemy armor.

heaven_wall.name: Angelic Wall
heaven_wall.description: This blessed structure helps coordinate the defense of the heavens.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

heaven_wrath_tower.name: Wrath Tower
heaven_wrath_tower.description: A holy spike that strikes with divine wrath.

special.description: Attacks ignore 1 enemy armor.

heaven_retribution_tower.name: Retribution Tower
heaven_retribution_tower.description: Invading forces will be met with a holy retribution.

special.description: Attacks ignore 3 enemy armor.

heaven_judgment_tower.name: Judgment Tower
heaven_judgment_tower.description: The darkness will be illuminated by the light of judgment.

special.description: Attacks ignore 4 enemy armor.

heaven_beacon_of_light.name: Beacon of Light
heaven_beacon_of_light.description: A beacon of pure heavenly light that exposes enemy armor.

special.description: Enemies within the aura have their armor reduced by 1.

heaven_archangel.name: Archangel
heaven_archangel.description: Archangels hold the line against the forces of darkness.

special.description: Attacks ignore 4 enemy armor.

heaven_seraphim.name: Seraphim
heaven_seraphim.description: Defilers are condemed to death by the seraphim.

special.description: Attacks ignore 5 enemy armor.

solar.description: Cosmic faction that melts foes with celestial energy.

solar_wall.name: Universe Edge
solar_wall.description: A barrier at the edge of light itself.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

solar_sun_spot.name: Sun Spot
solar_sun_spot.description: The Sun Spot emits waves ofsolar energy, causing nearby enemies to melt away.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_ray.name: Solar Ray
solar_ray.description: The Solar Ray beam emits pure solar energy.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_photon_relay.name: Photon Relay
solar_photon_relay.description: The Photon Relay absorbs nearby energy, amplifying nearby solar damage.

solar_helios.name: Helios
solar_helios.description: The Helios beam is a nightmare for anyone who enjoys the cold.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_corona.name: Corona
solar_corona.description: The Corona emits beams so hot it can melt nearly anything.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_star_forge.name: Star Forge
solar_star_forge.description: Harnessing the power of nearby solar emissions, one can wield the power of creation itself.

special.description: Requires at least 12 immediately adjacent Solar towers to operate.

nomad_clans.description: A nomadic people with versatile skills, relying on resourcefulness and knowledge of the land rather than advanced technology.

nomad_wall.name: Sand Rock
nomad_wall.description: Large sandy rocks provide temporary cover for the nomads.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

nomad_dune_dweller.name: Dune Raider
nomad_dune_dweller.description: With axe in hand, the raiders' grit is unyielding.

nomad_seer.name: Seer
nomad_seer.description: The seer is considered the wisest of the nomads.

nomad_bazaar.name: Bazaar
nomad_bazaar.description: The bazaar is a bustling market where the nomads trade goods and services.

special.description: Generates 5 gold per second.

nomad_spirit_ward.name: Spirit Ward
nomad_spirit_ward.description: This shamanistic effigy defends nomadic society against evil spirits.

special.description: Only targets Ethereal enemies.

nomad_caravan_guard.name: Caravan Guard
nomad_caravan_guard.description: A heavily armed and armored vetern of nomad society who protects the nomads' cargo.

nomad_bounty_hunter.name: Bounty Hunter
nomad_bounty_hunter.description: Hired guns don't come cheap, nor do they ask questions about what's in the caravans.

special.description: If this tower gets the killing blow, the player loses 1 gold.

nomad_boomeranger.name: Boomeranger
nomad_boomeranger.description: A skilled warrior wielding a mysterious deadly glaive

special.description: Throws a boomerang that travels out and returns along an offset path, damaging enemies.

nomad_caravan_depot.name: Caravan Depot
nomad_caravan_depot.description: Thieves are in for a deadly surprise.

special.description: Launches a fixed-distance caravan that damages enemies it passes through and explodes at its destination.

ogre_stronghold.description: Brutish ogres wielding massive clubs and fists. They hit from melee range only, but have high crit and crit multipliers.

ogre_wall.name: Spike Wall
ogre_wall.description: It's both crude and terrifying, adorned with the skulls of the fallen.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

ogre_kin.name: Ogrekin
ogre_kin.description: Even the smallest ogres can overpower tough adversaries.

ogre_mage.name: Ogre Mage
ogre_mage.description: Few ogres dabble in the arcane arts, often with surprising results.

ogre_brute.name: Ogre Brute
ogre_brute.description: Brutes often lead the charge, their massive clubs a formidable sight.

ogre_war_drums.name: War Drums
ogre_war_drums.description: The drums of war inspire the ogres to fight with greater ferocity.

special.description: Periodically pulses, granting nearby friendly towers +0.5 critical damage multiplier for 1 second.

ogre_stomping_grounds.name: Stomping Grounds
ogre_stomping_grounds.description: Ogres often gather to prove their strength... or obliterate captured slaves.

special.description: Grants nearby towers +0.5 critical chance and +0.5 critical damage multiplier.

ogre_smasher.name: Ogre Smasher
ogre_smasher.description: Smashers strike with such ferocity that can rattle even the mighitest warrior.

ogre_chieftain.name: Ogre Chieftain
ogre_chieftain.description: Chieftains are the biggest and the strongest of the ogres.

special.description: 20% chance on attack to increase own damage by 15% for 4 seconds.

industry.description: Industrialists are a race of people who are skilled in the art of building and manufacturing. They are known for their ability to create powerful machines and structures.

industry_wall.name: Factory Wall
industry_wall.description: The factory wall is a sturdy structure allows industry to flourish.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

industry_machinist.name: Machinist
industry_machinist.description: The backbone of Industry, high damage output for a starting tower.

industry_smog_generator.name: Factory
industry_smog_generator.description: Factory smog increases the vulnerability of Air units.

special.description: Nearby projectile towers deal 20% more damage to Air units.

industry_oil_rig.name: Oil Rig
industry_oil_rig.description: Oil rigs generate gold for the player.

special.description: Periodically generates between 1 and 10 gold.

industry_missile_battery.name: Missile Battery Platform
industry_missile_battery.description: A missile battery platform that fires a rapid salvo of 6 missiles, then reloads.

special.description: Fires a rapid salvo of 6 missiles, then reloads.

industry_gattling_gun.name: Gattling Gun
industry_gattling_gun.description: A gun that revs up to 5 levels, increasing damage and speed.

special.description: Impact creates a lingering fallout zone.
